thread.title: Bears prepare for depleted UCLA defense Thursday
thread.title_full: Bears prepare for depleted UCLA defense Thursday - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Connor Letourneau
title: Bears prepare for depleted UCLA defense Thursday
text:
Photo: Tony Avelar / Associated Press UCLA coach Jim Mora watches from the sideline during the second half against Stanford in an NCAA college football game Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, Stanford, Calif. Stanford won 56-35. (AP Photo/Tony Avelar) UCLA coach Jim Mora watches from the sideline during the second...
A depleted UCLA defense could provide the antidote for No. 20 Cal’s recent offensive ills. UCLA coach Jim Mora watches from the sideline during the second half against Stanford in an NCAA college football game Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, Stanford, Calif. Stanford won 56-35. (AP Photo/Tony Avelar) UCLA coach Jim Mora watches from the sideline during the second...
A depleted UCLA defense could provide the antidote for No. 20 Cal’s recent offensive ills.
